ngMultiTransclude
directive in module ng-directives-utils.multiTransclude

Description

register cloneLinking(clone) to the manager. This will append the passing transclude element to the current element. If there is no transclude passing, nothing happens.

Usage

as element:
<ng-multi-transclude
       [ng-multi-transclude="{string}"]>
</ng-multi-transclude>
as attribute
<ANY ng-multi-transclude
     [ng-multi-transclude="{string}"]>
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
ng-multi-transclude
(optional)
string

directive name, if not passing will treat as the default one
